alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:16AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nuckolls and Thayer Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 716 AM CDT, an automated weather station reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carleton to Hardy. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Carleton around 720 AM CDT. Bruning and Belvidere around 725 AM CDT. Alexandria around 735 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Chester and Hubbell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
